item.title: Report E-2024120247
item.description:
Report E-2024120247

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-06
  • City: CANTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On December 5, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of organic peroxide was punctured and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the top of the pail. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Green Site Services Group (GSS) to remediate the impacted site. The crew collected and containerized the damaged pail in one (1) vented 30-gallon drum for disposal.
